betterux.midnightconfig.title: BetterUX Settings
betterux.midnightconfig.closeOnRightClic: Close an open screen by just right-clicking anywhere.
betterux.midnightconfig.closeScreenButto: Configures which mouse button closes an open screen when you click anywhere outside of it.
betterux.midnightconfig.reverseHotbarScr: Reverses the mouse-wheel scrolling direction of the inventory hotbar.
betterux.midnightconfig.focusSearchField: Automatically focus the search field when opening a dialog with a recipe book.
betterux.midnightconfig.showSortButton.t: Enables or disables the sort button in inventory screens.
betterux.midnightconfig.showTakeButton.t: Enables or disables the take-all button in inventory screens.
Enables or disables the store-all button in inventory screens.
